name: Defending Hope
description:
Defending Hope is a fast-paced tactical game. 

You place groups of soldiers down on the map and run the simulation, hoping to delay the zombies enough to protect the cities beyond. Hope will fall, but how long can you delay the inevitable? 

Team: 

Draconic Chipmunk - Creative Director and Artist

Vansh Jhunjhunwala - Technical Developer

Xingzhe Li - Technical Developer

The Spectralist - Composer
